product_name: Innova Disc Golf Champion Tie-Dye Disc
long_description: Advanced players looking for a unique look and a consistent, dependable disc will love the stellar performance of a custom Champion Tie-Dye disc from Innova. Crafted from a blend of resilient polymers to offer the best combination of grip and durability. Fun tie-dye graphic captures the spirit of disc golf. PDGA approved for use on all disc golf courses. Assorted styles; specific style and color requests cannot be accommodated (will be one of these Champion models: Beast, Roadrunner, Sidewinder, Starfire, Valkyrie or Wraith). Sorry, color and weight requests cannot be accommodated; please shop in-store for specific colors and weights.
short_description: Advanced players looking for a unique look and a consistent, dependable disc will love the stellar performance of a custom Champion Tie-Dye disc from Innova.
